segments.text: Yeah , this is my first visit here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , but I speak English with a strong German accent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But let me tell you , you're doing just fine . I couldn't do half as well as you do when I was learning German . By the way , how long have you been learning English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On and off , for quite a few years .
segments.speaker: S2
